description:
The platoon`s messenger-dog, who has a bad habit of biting peoples` heads. He is very fast, reliable and sensitive to the emotions of his team. He resembles a http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Labrador_Retriever [Labrador Retriever].
While Mercury is normally seen as a friendly dog, when events warrant it, he shows himself to be what the commoners referred to as a "military hound," and can even disarm opponents.
Source: Wiki
name: Mercury
